view.message:
What is your name? My name is Kara Voss and I am from a small town called Washington, Missouri. 

What is your quest? I am a junior and would like to head into the management industry after college while creating my own start-up (hopefully). 

What is your favorite color? I love to draw and paint whenever I have time!

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? As I am very unfamiliar with the research portion of the marketing industry, I would like to learn more about the different career paths it offers.

What is your name? My name is Lauren Fritz and I am from Kansas City.

What is your quest? I am a senior and I would love to work for a marketing firm after I graduate and move to California. 

What is your favorite color? I guess a hobby of mine is online shopping, I am always doing it and I find it very fun and calming. I am very into clothes and that kind of stuff. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I am unfamiliar with the research side of marketing so I think I would just like to have a better grasp of what it is by the end of the course and see if it is something that interests me.

What is your name? My name is Lauren Sherwood and I am from Kansas City. 

What is your quest? I am a junior and would like to work for a company doing marketing analytics. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite animal is a penguin and I hope to visit Antarctica one day to see some!

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I only know a little about marketing research, but I plan to learn skills that I can apply to my career.

What is your name? My name is Anna Richardson and I am from Hannibal, Missouri.

What is your quest? I am a junior and I want to explore different kinds of marketing roles in the future.

What is your favorite color? My hobbies include shopping, traveling, and eating.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I am unfamiliar with marketing research so I hope to learn what it does, how it works, and how it applies to different career roles.

What is your name? My name is Sarah Turnbaugh and I am from Columbia.

What is your quest? I am a senior and would like to work in the marketing industry.

What is your favorite color? I like to paint. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn how marketing research is applicable in future jobs I may have.

What is your name? My name is Clay Kruse and I am from St. Louis.

What is your quest? I am a senior and I would like to enter a sales position in an enjoyable industry.

What is your favorite color? I play club volleyball here at Mizzou.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn efficient ways to begin research for different types of products. I have spent a little bit of time researching for previous marketing courses, but jumping from database to database is a headache when you are not exactly sure what you are looking for.

What is your name? My name is Ethan Garamella and I am from St. Louis, Missouri

What is your quest? I am a senior and I plan to go into sales

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue because I like the ocean

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? At the end of this course, I plan to have a greater understanding of a sales role.

What is your name? My name is Brendan Heron and I am from St. Louis. 

What is your quest? I am a junior and I would like to either do some type of marketing statistics or be a salesperson for a sports company. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is blue and my hobbies are watching/playing sports and listening to music. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? Since I am interested in marketing statistics, I want to learn the stats behind marketing research and how to conduct it properly. I want to learn what things are useful to look for and what to stay away from.

What is your name? My name is Neven Naumovski from Chicago, IL.

What is your quest? I am a senior and would like to be involved in the marketing industry after school.

What is your favorite color? I am always listening to music!

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I am not very familiar with the different ways that market research is conducted and am very curious about it.

What is your name? My name is Braden Johnson and I am from Shorewood, IL which is about an hour south of Chicago.

What is your quest? I am a junior and would like to become a marketing analyst.

What is your favorite color? Some of my hobbies include writing and listening to music.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I want to become more familiar with marketing research and learn how it can be applied to various career paths in the field.

What is your name? My name is Olivia Barrett and I am from Kansas City.

What is your quest? I am a senior and after graduation I want to work as a marketing consultant.

What is your favorite color? I enjoy decorating my room and buying different candles.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I am looking forward to learning about marketing research as a whole because I think it will be useful in my future marketing career.

What is your name? My name is Lexie Bentley and I'm from Dardenne Prairie, Missouri, about 45 minutes from St. Louis.

What is your quest? I'm currently a junior studying Marketing with a minor in Entrepreneurship. I would like to pursue something in digital marketing in the future.

What is your favorite color? Some of my hobbies are spending time with friends, watching football, and hiking. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I am not very familiar with market research, but I am interested to learn how research can differ depending on your target audience.

What is your name? Riley Cooper & Columbia, Missouri 

What is your quest? Senior & Social Media Marketing 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is pink, I have a 1-year-old golden retriever that I still consider a puppy, his feet are bigger than mine to put in perspective how big he is.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I can't say research intrigues me so there is much I don't know about. I would like to learn about the importance of it and the different ways to conduct research but which ways are the most efficient.

What is your name?   My name is Garrett Henson, and I am from Dexter, Missouri. 

What is your quest?   I am a junior and by the end of the program I would like to be some sort of marketing consultant. 

What is your favorite color?   A hobby that I really enjoy is golfing, and I have actually took a golf trip to Utah to golf at some of their super nice courses there. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?  A few things I would like to learn about marketing research is how consumers react differently to different types of advertising.

David Sandall

I am a Senior at Mizzou, I would like to work in partnerships.

I am born on Christmas

I would like to know the fundamentals to marketing research.

What is your name? My name is Hannah Foster. I am from Moberly, MO.

What is your quest? I am a junior. I would like to work in event marketing after graduation. 

What is your favorite color? A fact about me is that I enjoy rainy days more than sunny days. I believe coffee and movies are better when it's rainy outside.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? At the very least, I would like to learn enough about marketing research to be able to carry a conversation about something related to the subject. At this point in time I definitely cannot do that.

Jonathon Yancik - Edwardsville, IL
Senior, not sure.
I’m a baseball nerd.
To see how a business can improve itself using marketing research.

What is your name? My name is Jayden Ralston and I am from Jefferson City Missouri.

What is your quest? I am a junior and I would love to be a marketing manager.

What is your favorite color? I love traveling to different places!

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I don't know much about marketing research so I guess my question would be what is marketing research? And what are the different ways it is used?

Name: My name is Conner Lynch. I am from Roselle Illinois. 
Quest: I am a senior, hoping to get an entry level marketing position before graduation.
Favorite color: I like skiing 
Airspeed: I could not say anything specific, I am excited to learn about marketing research in general.

What is your name? My name is Sarah Spencer and I am from Kansas City, Missouri.

What is your quest? I am a Senior and I would like to end up at a marketing or advertising firm. I'm not sure which specialty, though. 

What is your favorite color? A fun fact about me is that I lived in Japan for the first 6 years of my life.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I want to learn more about testing with real consumers. The company I intern with does this a lot so I would definitely like to know more about it.

1. My name is Amy Bryan and I am from a small town in northeast Missouri called Palmyra, but I just moved to STL last summer. 

2. I am a junior, and after graduation next year, I have no idea what I want to do. 

3. My favorite color is pink, and my favorite sport to both watch and play is tennis. 

4. By the end of this course, I would like to know the basics of marketing research and hopefully how to utilize that knowledge in the workplace.

What is your name? Matt Jacobsen from O'Fallon, MO

What is your quest? I am in my senior year and would like to work in Sports Marketing.

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is Blue.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn the best marketing research methods and how the answer to that question changes depending on your research situation.

What is your name? Dawson Erholtz Kansas City, MO

What is your quest? Senior and I will be moving to Dallas, TX in June of 2023 to start my job as an account manager at Gartner. 

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is Navy 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I hope to learn more about marketing research as a whole and am excited to expand my knowledge in this field for future use.

What is your name? Alexandra Briordy, I go by "A". I'm from the Northwest suburbs of Chicago.

What is your quest? I am a junior this year, and I'd like to have a career in marketing analytics?

What is your favorite color? I've practiced Jiujitsu for 5 years and am a gymnastics coach.

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I am familiar with more analytics and website data gathering (GA, SQL, Python, R, etc.) but fluent in only GA. I'd like to learn about other ways to collect, analyze and present data. I've used Tableau for some representations, but I know there are definitely more appealing ways.

What is your name? My name is Audra Schindehette and I am from St. Louis, MO.

What is your quest? I am a senior and will be working in the Medical Device industry. 

What is your favorite color? I started LINK x LOU Columbia, a permanent jewelry company, with my roommate last year. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? I would like to learn how marketing research is applicable in future jobs I may have.
